item.title: SKYPULL system
item.description: Project Overview: Airborne Wind Energy System (AWES) Step 1. Understand the Objective The Airborne Wind Energy System (AWES) aims to generate power using fixed-wing drones that utilize wind energy efficiently. The system features a rigid-body drone that flies in a Figure-of-Eight pattern, controlled by algorithms to harvest optimal power from the lift generated by its wings. Step 2. Learn the Key Details This innovative approach, demonstrated in this video, involves the use of drones to capture wind energy, offering a promising alternative to traditional wind turbines with potentially higher efficiency and lower environmental impact.
